DOC.brief_summary: The EQUAL study design adult survivor childhood acute lymphoblastic leukemia ( ALL ) overweight obese . The purpose study see diet exercise help people lose weight improve health problem . This two year study compare two method inform participant way lose weight .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise QUality Diet After Leukemia : The EQUAL Study
DOC.criteria: Eligibility confirm via CCSSbased medical record series question EQUAL website , prior consent . Participation CCSS cohort Diagnosed acute lymphoblastic leukemia < 18 year age Cancer free time study enrollment Current age ≥ 18 year A body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 25 kg/m2 ( overweight obese ) , determine selfreported height weight recent CCSS questionnaire Internet access personal email account Able read comprehend informed consent Prior history congestive heart failure , coronary artery disease , myocardial infarction , stroke , unstable angina ; Medical condition weight loss might contraindicate would cause weight loss , pregnancy , anorexia bulimia ; Use prescription weight loss medication within previous 6 month History total body irradiation ( TBI )
